trends: There have been no other sightings in Euxton
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsAt the time, I was in my bedroom, looking out of the window, facing north. I was trying to spot some lightning, because it was stormy, and the storm was almost directly above us. I spotted a fireball in the sky. It was just hovering there. Then it went out, and a second, brighter one appeared. After a short while, the first reapppeared. They quickly vannished though. When I first saw them, I took a video on my Sony Ericcson W300i phone, which I attached to this. I stopped recording when the fireballs disappeared.
